column1: Welcome to Zombie In My Pocket CLI Edition.
This is a board game based on https://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/33468/zombie-my-pocket

column2: you're searching for the secret of the evil temple where you can find the item to destroy

column1: the zombies rising from the dead. You can pick up items to bash zombies along the way; a machete
or even your former uncle's grisly femur.

column2: then bury it in the backyard graveyard before midnight and you've saved the world.

column1: use the start command to start a new game
use the load [save name] command to load a saved game (located within the saves folder within the root of the code)
Use the help and help all commands to see all of the commands at your disposal
You can manipulate and place maptiles
as well as interact with the environment to win the game
